message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MM. 

The paper proposes a method for learning a similarity metric from data, which is a core component of many machine learning systems. The method involves modelling the adjacency matrix of a binary relation and learning target vectors for each instance. This suggests that the paper could belong to the sub-categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG), Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), or Multimedia (cs.MM).
